title: Four painters would paint a house in 14 days. How long would it take five painters to paint the house? How long will it take if two other painters come to help after 5 days? - Quora

response.answer_text: [math]4\text{ painters }\times14\text{ days }=56\text{ painter-days}\\ 5\text{ painters complete }\dfrac{5}{56}\text{ of the job per day,}\\ \text{finishing in }\dfrac{56}{5}=11.2\text{ days}\\ \text{The 5 painters complete }\dfrac{25}{56}\text{ in 5 days,}\\ \text{with }\dfrac{31}{56}\text{ remaining.}\\ 7\text{ painters complete }\dfrac{7}{56}=\dfrac{1}{8}\text{ of the job per day.}\\ \dfrac{31}{56}\text{ job }\cdot\dfrac{1\text{ day}}{\dfrac{1}{8}\text{ job}}=\dfrac{31}{7}\text{ days}[/math]
